verses.text: \w I|strong="H1961"\w* cry \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* voice \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. \w With|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* voice, \w I|strong="H1961"\w* ask \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H1961"\w* mercy.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* pour \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* complaint before \w him|strong="H6963"\w*. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* tell \w him|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* troubles.

When \w my|strong="H8210"\w* spirit \w was|strong="H6440"\w* overwhelmed \w within|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* knew \w my|strong="H8210"\w* route. \w On|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* path \w in|strong="H6440"\w* which \w I|strong="H6869"\w* walk, \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H6869"\w* hidden \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Look \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w no|strong="H3045"\w* one \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w concerned|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. Refuge \w has|strong="H7307"\w* \w fled|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w No|strong="H3045"\w* one cares \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul.

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* cried \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. \w I|strong="H5315"\w* said, “\w You|strong="H4480"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4498"\w*, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w portion|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w living|strong="H5315"\w*.”

Listen \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* desperate need. Deliver \w me|strong="H2416"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* persecutors, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* too strong \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2416"\w*.

Bring \w my|strong="H5337"\w* soul \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* prison, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* \w give|strong="H7181"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* righteous \w will|strong="H3588"\w* surround \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w good|strong="H3966"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.
